Package com.dua3.utility.swing

Class SwingUtil

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.swing.SwingUtil
public final class SwingUtil extends Object
Utility methods for Swing applications.

    • getDisplayScale

      public static Scale2f getDisplayScale(Component component)
      Retrieves the display scale of a given Component.
      Parameters:
      component - the component for which to retrieve the display scale
      Returns:
      the display scale of the component, or the default scale if no GraphicsConfiguration is set for the component

    • getDisplayScale

      Returns the display scale factor of the given GraphicsConfiguration.
      Parameters:
      conf - the GraphicsConfiguration to retrieve the display scale factor from
      Returns:
      the display scale

      public static void setNativeLookAndFeel()
      Set the Swing Look&Feel to the native Look&Feel. On macOS, the global menubar is also enabled.

    • setNativeLookAndFeel

      public static void setNativeLookAndFeel(String applicationName)
      Set the Swing Look&Feel to the native Look&Feel. On macOS, the global menubar is also enabled.
      Parameters:
      applicationName - the application name to set

    • showDirectoryOpenDialog

      public static Optional<Path> showDirectoryOpenDialog(@Nullable Component parent, Path current)
      Show directory open dialog.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent component for the dialog
      current - the current file, it determines the folder shown when the dialog opens
      Returns:
      Optional containing the path to the selected file.

    • showFileOpenDialog

      @SafeVarargs public static Optional<Path> showFileOpenDialog(@Nullable Component parent, Path current, Pair<String,String[]>... types)
      Show file open dialog.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent component for the dialog
      current - the current file, it determines the folder shown when the dialog opens
      types - the selectable file name filters, given as pairs of description and one or more extensions
      Returns:
      Optional containing the path to the selected file.

    • showFileSaveDialog

      @SafeVarargs public static Optional<Path> showFileSaveDialog(@Nullable Component parent, Path current, Pair<String,String[]>... types)
      Show file save dialog.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent component for the dialog
      current - the current file, it determines the folder shown when the dialog opens
      types - the selectable file name filters, given as pairs of description and one or more extensions
      Returns:
      Optional containing the path to the selected file.

    • convertToSwingPath

      public static Path2D convertToSwingPath(Path2f path)
      Converts a Path2f object to a Path2D.
      Parameters:
      path - the Path2f object containing segments to be converted to a JavaFX Path
      Returns:
      a JavaFX Path object representing the equivalent structure of the input Path2f
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if an unsupported segment type or unsupported number of control points is encountered

    • updateAndScrollToBottom

      public static void updateAndScrollToBottom(JScrollPane sp, Runnable update)
      Execute update and scroll to bottom.

      If the JScrollPane given as parameter is scrolled to the bottom prior to performing the update, it will be scrolled to the bottom after executing the update. Otherwise, only the update is performed.

      Parameters:
      sp - a scroll pane
      update - Runnable to do the update

    • updateAndScrollToEnd

      public static void updateAndScrollToEnd(JScrollBar sb, Runnable update)
      Execute update and scroll to end.

      If the JScrollBar given as parameter is scrolled to the end prior to performing the update, it will be scrolled to the end again after executing the update. Otherwise, only the update is performed.

      Parameters:
      sb - a scroll bar
      update - Runnable to do the update

    • showOpenDialog

      @SafeVarargs public static Optional<Path> showOpenDialog(@Nullable Component parent, Path current, int selectionMode, Pair<String,String[]>... types)
      Show open dialog.
      Parameters:
      parent - the parent component for the dialog
      current - the current path selected when the dialog opens
      selectionMode - the selection mode as used in JFileChooser.setFileSelectionMode(int)
      types - pairs(description, list of extensions) used to create FileNameExtensionFilter instances
      Returns:
      an Optional holding the selected path or an empty Optional if nothing was selected

    • setUnitIncrement

      public static void setUnitIncrement(JScrollBar sb, int unitIncrement)
      Set the unit increment.
      Parameters:
      sb - the scroll bar, null is allowed
      unitIncrement - the unit increment

      Returns:

    • addDropFilesSupport

      public static void addDropFilesSupport(JComponent component, Consumer<? super Collection<File>> action)
      Add support for dropping Files on a component.
      Parameters:
      component - the component to add drop support to
      action - the action to perform when files are dropped

    • addDropFilesSupport

      public static void addDropFilesSupport(JComponent component, Consumer<? super Collection<File>> action, Predicate<? super Collection<File>> test, Consumer<? super Exception> exceptionHandler)
      Add support for dropping Files on a component.
      Parameters:
      component - the component to add drop support to
      action - the action to perform when files are dropped
      test - Predicate to decide whether dropping is allowed (should execute fast; called frequently during drag)
      exceptionHandler - handler to call when an exception is caught

    • addDropTextSupport

      public static void addDropTextSupport(JComponent component, Consumer<? super String> action)
      Add support for dropping text on a component.
      Parameters:
      component - the component to add drop support to
      action - the action to perform when text is dropped

    • addDropTextSupport

      public static void addDropTextSupport(JComponent component, Consumer<? super String> action, Predicate<? super String> test, Consumer<? super Exception> exceptionHandler)
      Add support for dropping text on a component.
      Parameters:
      component - the component to add drop support to
      action - the action to perform when files are dropped
      test - Predicate to decide whether dropping is allowed (should execute fast; called frequently during drag)
      exceptionHandler - handler to call when an exception is caught

    • setRenderingQualityHigh

      public static void setRenderingQualityHigh(Graphics2D g2d)
      Configures the rendering quality settings for a Graphics2D object to enhance visual quality.
      Parameters:
      g2d - the Graphics2D object whose rendering settings are to be configured
